text: Leaving is the sixth EP by American electronic music producer, Skrillex. Leaving was released on January 2, 2013 to OWSLA's subscription service called The Nest. Skrillex said that the title song "Leaving" was created in his hotel room in Mexico and that the song "The Reason" was finished an hour before the release of the EP in Moore's hotel room in Miami. ==Songs== ==References== ==Other websites== *Leaving at Discogs Category:2013 albums Category:Skrillex albums
title: Leaving (EP)
